name: WP Post Demo
author: momen2009

sections.description: This is a plug-in to create simple to post demo page that is already published. This edit screen of Posts and fixed page as a plug-in to enable you to display the editor for editing demo page. By to enter the demo content to demo page editing editor update, you will be able to easily create a demo page. After that I just click the demo view button.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the wp-post-demo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • A change since the previous version.
  • Another change.

1.1

  • What you have entered in the editor in WordPress 3.5 has fixed the bug that is not restored.

1.2

  • Made it possible to display hidden in Show on screen.

1.3

  • Move the View Demo button next to the Get Shortlink button.

1.4

  • Added the View Demo button in admin bar.

1.5

  • I made it possible to set a password on a demo page.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the wp-post-demo folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress.
